column5: Hey guys its been a while....got a 2 week vacation.  So thought I would come and let you know how its going..... To start the fishing is AMAZING unfortunately I have no pictures yet......but man is it ever fun to fight those northerns.  Here is the list of trophy fish my guests have caught thus far.  NORTHERN PIKE  David Tucker 41" Northern  Joe Duncan 40" Northern  Justin Duncan 39.5" Northern  Greg Happ 42" Northern  WALLEYE  Danner Smith 27" Walleye  Dale Thompson 27.5" Walleye  SMALLMOUTH BASS  Danner Smith 18" Bass  Fred Marchini  18.5" Bass  Terry Farmer 19" Bass  Terry Farmer 18" Bass  Jake Burnenger 18" Bass  Peter Osgood  18" Bass   And numerous big fish......just about every 2 days or so a big northern cruises by a walleye hole and grabs onto fish you are reeling in.....i watched one swallow a perch whole and snap the line it was AWESOME!!!  anyways guys sorry bout the no pics when i left i had no money to buy a camera but i plan on getting one for when i return in a couple weeks....so i can leave a GOOD report for you fellas....  Till then,  Hawk

Weren't you a member on here before?  ... are you not familiar with the "no pics... no believe" clause in effect?     Just kiddin' ya!  It sounds like you're having a great time... but without pics... it's just a "story" eh?
where are you guys fishing?  cheers!
Use yer e mag a nation redneck. You getting the pics now? LOL  Some real nice fish yer all getting there Chickenhawk. TFS
the English River near Minaki and Kenora....its awesome....i will have pictures for you all at the end of August
Good to hear that your enjoying yourself. No pics at the end of the whole summer though = no fish!!!!
they'll be there guys i promise hopefully get some footage of some northerns taking out walleyes
Atta boy,Hawk! Now you catch a monster for us & stay away from the local girls or you'll end up married!!

sounds great Hawk, cant wait to see the pics....in fact you are only about 2 hours up the road from where i live...better ge4t up there and get some of that action...and i dont mean the local girls...lol
